Html:
Are there any plans to add in import/export functionality? I'm planning on creating a task for each customer, and letting them control the (I guess actions) frequency and time of day. I would love to export out XMLs of these via code, so in the event of a real failure, I could import them back in and be on my merry way.

Thanks!

Each TaskDefinition has an XML property that can be written to to file. There are examples of how to import and export XML in the test project linked here http://taskscheduler.codeplex.com/SourceControl/changeset/view/69048#1108790.
